newsitem.title: MAURITIUS: Mauritius construction company 1996 profits down.
newsitem.headline: Mauritius construction company 1996 profits down.

text.p: Mauritian construction company Gamma Civic on Wednesday reported a 24 percent drop in pre-tax profit for the financial year ending 30 June 1996.
The company's financial results showed Gamma Civic ended 1995/96 with a pre-tax profit of 20.2 million rupees ($980,000), down from 26.6 million rupees in 1994/95.

Gamma Civic turnover was 15 percent up to 448.8 million rupees in 1995/96 from 391.4 million rupees the previous financial year while profit after tax fell to 20.2 million rupees from 26.5 million rupees.
Gamma Civic is a vertically integrated construction company with activities ranging from stone crushing and macadam production to civil engineering works and building block manufacturing.
